alert.note: Alert for Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 2:19PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 300 PM MST... At 219 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Sahuarita, or over Sahuarita. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Green Valley, East Sahuarita and Summit. This includes Interstate 19 between mile markers 42 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
